channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Streeting ‘not in favour of breaking manifesto pledges’ as Treasury considers lowering income tax thresholds – UK politics live
item.description: A source told the Guardian that plans to break the manifesto pledge on income tax had been ditched by Rachel Reeves This is from Helen Miller , direct...

item.title: Zelenskyy condemns Russia’s ‘wicked’ overnight attack on Ukraine – Europe live
item.description: Drones and missiles used to target Kyiv with at least four people killed and ‘dozens’ wounded Russia attacks every district of Kyiv in Brussels In oth...

item.title: Anger in South Africa after plane of Palestinians held on tarmac for 12 hours
item.description: Authorities held 153 passengers, including children and a heavily pregnant woman, over travel documents South African authorities are facing heavy cri...

item.title: Catholic bishops condemn Trump administration’s immigration enforcement – US politics live
item.description: US Conference of Catholic Bishops issues rare condemnation of president immigration crackdown and calls for ‘meaningful immigration reform’ Only 29% o...

item.title: London judge rules BHP Group liable for Brazil’s 2015 Samarco dam collapse
item.description: About 600,000 people seeking compensation a decade on from disaster that killed 19 and devastated villages A London judge has ruled that the global mi...

item.title: Freed British-Egyptian activist not allowed to fly to UK, family says
item.description: Mr Abdel Fattah was Egypt's best known political prisoner until seven weeks ago, when he was released from jail.

item.title: Doctors harming patients by striking, says health secretary
item.description: Doctors on strike for 13th time in a long-running pay dispute "completely irresponsible", says Wes Streeing.

item.title: Reeves backs off from proposals to raise income tax rates at Budget
item.description: The chancellor had been widely expected to increase income tax rates, which would have broken a manifesto promise.

item.title: Amber warnings issued as Storm Claudia brings heavy rain and flooding to UK
item.description: Storm Claudia will bring heavy and persistent rain to parts of the UK on Friday. Amber warnings have been issued and there is a risk of flooding and d...

item.title: Fly-tippers bury field in mountain of waste
item.description: The enormous pile of rubbish is called an "environmental catastrophe unfolding in plain sight".
